user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for hydrogen using the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios ('NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE') for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.', select the most appropriate entity for hydrogen demand profile generation.

tasks.description: Split the nodes of the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Split the nodes', select the nodes to be split from the generated demand profiles.

tasks.description: Convert the hourly hydrogen demand profiles into TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Convert to tst format', select the demand profile objects to be converted.
